thread.title: Fight between Quaid's wife, shooting suspect involved feces
thread.title_full: Fight between Quaid's wife, shooting suspect involved feces - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Fight between Quaid's wife, shooting suspect involved feces
text:
SOUTH BURLINGTON, Vt. - The Vermont Corrections Department says a dispute between Randy Quaid's wife and another inmate involved feces.
Officials at the Chittenden Correctional Facility say Evi Quaid had an argument with Veronica Lewis, the woman accused this summer of shooting a firearms instructor. Quaid was arrested in Highgate with her husband, Randy Quaid, Friday. They are charged as fugitives from justice.
The Corrections Department confirms excrement was involved in the fight, but would not say to what extent.
Both Vermont State Police and the DOC are investigating the incident.
